overview: If there's one man who changed the course of queer men's fantasies forever, it's erotic illustrator Tom of Finland. In partnership with Tom of Finland, and with the help of some of today's best artists and directors, Men.com has brought Tom's most iconic sexual visions to life.
tagline: Men.com's first collaboration with iconic queer erotic illustrator Tom of Finland takes things back to Tom's early days in 1957.
title: Tom of Finland
